NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 COLEUS: My guess is Giant's Deep. 2 1 MELORAE: My guess is the sixth location. 3 2 PHLOX: The Quantum Moon was orbiting Giant's Deep! Coleus wins the phantom moon game again! 4 3 MELORAE: I do not believe in such coincidences! Coleus, did you leave a pair of eyes at the Quantum Moon locator? You have won too many games in succession! 5 3 PHLOX: Oh! Melorae, Melorae! The tentacled species are visiting the surface again! 6 5 PHLOX: Whenever Giant's Deep wins, the tentacled species come up to visit us! They must be happy to meet the Quantum Moon too! 7 6 MELORAE: I.. I have never noticed this trend before. Could the tentacled species be drawn to the surface by the effect of the Quantum Moon's gravity on their water-composed bodies? 8 7 COLEUS: I have a pair of eyes on Ember Twin right now: I can fully confirm the surfacing phenomenon occurs each time the Quantum Moon visits. Phlox! You may have solved the mystery of the surfacing phenomenon at last! 9 8 MELORAE: Of note: as Coleus has just proven he was cheating using the Quantum Moon locator, in addition to Phlox's incredible findings, I find myself to be the winner of the phantom moon game!
